tracks.name: Bahrain International Circuit
tracks.blurb: A marvel in the desert, the Bahrain International Circuit offers a unique blend of technical challenges and fast-paced racing. The track's layout features a mix of long straights, demanding hairpin turns, and tricky sections.

tracks.name: Jeddah Corniche Circuit
tracks.blurb: Carved along the Red Sea coastline, this adrenaline-fueled track marks Saudi Arabia's entry into the world of motorsport, captivating enthusiasts with its mesmerizing 6.175-kilometer layout, winding through the city's urban landscape.

tracks.name: Albert Park Grand Prix Circuit
tracks.blurb: The Albert Park Circuit, nestled in the heart of Melbourne, kicks off the Formula 1 season with its fast and flowing layout around Albert Park Lake. This temporary street circuit combines a mix of fast straights and challenging corners, including the high-speed sections around Turns 11 and 12, demanding precision and agility from drivers.

tracks.name: Baku City Circuit
tracks.blurb: Renowned for its long straight and tight, narrow sections through the city streets, making it a high-speed challenge.

tracks.name: Miami International Autodrome
tracks.blurb: The Miami Autodrome made a thrilling addition to the Formula 1 roster and is a testament to the sport's growing American audience. This track, set in the vibrant city of Miami, embraces a blend of high-speed straights and technical corners designed to challenge the world's finest drivers.

tracks.name: Circuit de Monaco
tracks.blurb: The Circuit de Monaco is the iconic epitome of prestige, featuring narrow streets, tight corners, and limited overtaking opportunities, demanding precision and skill.

tracks.name: Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya
tracks.blurb: The Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya is a revered track in F1 that offers a diverse range of corners, testing the balance between high-speed sections and technical turns.

tracks.name: Silverstone Circuit
tracks.blurb: It's one of the oldest F1 circuits, and it's iconic. A high-speed track with fast corners like Copse and Maggots-Becketts-Chapel complex.

tracks.name: Hungaroring
tracks.blurb: A twisty, technical track with limited overtaking chances, testing driver skills on tight corners and short straights.

tracks.name: Circuit de Spa-Francorchamps
tracks.blurb: Spa-Francorchamps is a legendary track that winds through the picturesque Ardennes forest. Its undulating layout combines high-speed straights like the famed Eau Rouge-Raidillon complex with challenging corners such as Pouhon and Blanchimont, testing the mettle and bravery of drivers.

tracks.name: Circuit Park Zandvoort
tracks.blurb: A classic track revived for F1, featuring banked corners and elevation changes, offering a challenging, fast-paced race.

tracks.name: Marina Bay Street Circuit
tracks.blurb: The Marina Bay Street Circuit is a captivating fusion of speed and spectacle. Illuminated by a stunning array of lights against the backdrop of Singapore's skyline, this challenging track winds through the heart of the city.

tracks.name: Suzuka International Racing Course
tracks.blurb: A figure-eight track with challenging corners like the 'S' Curves and the famous 130R, known for its demanding yet rewarding layout.

tracks.name: Losail International Circuit
tracks.blurb: Born to host high-speed thrills, the Losail International Circuit, conceived in a whirlwind to accommodate Qatar's inaugural MotoGP in 2004, has since evolved to embrace the pinnacle of motorsport, welcoming its maiden Formula 1 Grand Prix in 2021.

tracks.name: Circuit of the Americas
tracks.blurb: This modern track in the heart of Texas boasts elevation changes, multiple challenging turns, and a thrilling atmosphere, for the US Grand Prix.

tracks.name: Las Vegas Strip Street Circuit
tracks.blurb: Welcoming the glitz and glamour of the entertainment capital, the Las Vegas Street Circuit offers a thrilling urban racing experience against the backdrop of the city's iconic landmarks. This newly introduced track is characterized by long, fast straights that wind through the bustling streets, providing adrenaline-pumping moments for drivers and fans alike.

tracks.name: Yas Marina Circuit
tracks.blurb: Known for its twilight race, it features tight corners and long straights, including the iconic backdrop of the Yas Hotel.
